tool_description: Creates mapping relationships between different metadata schemas to enable record conversion and interoperability.

source_schema.description: Source metadata schema: dublin_core, marc21, mods, ead, custom

target_schema.description: Target metadata schema: dublin_core, marc21, mods, ead, custom

mapping_rules.description: Custom field mapping rules in format 'source_field:target_field'

mapping_precision.description: Mapping approach: exact, balanced, or comprehensive

error_messages: Invalid schema names: Use dublin_core, marc21, mods, ead, or custom
Identical schemas: Source and target schemas must be different
Invalid mapping rules: Rules must follow 'source_field:target_field' format
Invalid mapping precision: Use exact, balanced, or comprehensive
Unsupported conversion: No crosswalk available for specified schema pair
usage: Specify source_schema and target_schema for automatic crosswalk generation. Provide custom mapping_rules for specialized conversions. Set mapping_precision to control conversion detail level.

mapping_coverage.description: Percentage of source fields that can be mapped

conversion_notes.description: Notes about mapping limitations and recommendations
